Signal¶

class mutis.signal.core.Signal(times, signs, method)[source]¶

Bases: object

Analysis and generation of a signal.

times~numpy.ndarray

Values of the time axis.

signs~numpy.ndarray

Values of the signal axis.

methodstr

Method used to generate the synthetic signal.
